summary: Finally figured out how to make my Heroic Dwarven Armor and Weapons into a standalone set
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=#00B0FC]NOTE: There are a lot of people who have mentioned that they would prefer a more lore-friendly retexture that doesn\'t look new and shiny.  In that case I HIGHLY recommend checking out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24398]aMidianBorn Dwarven Armor by CaBaL[/url] .  

He\'s done an amazing job on the Dwarven armor, and will be releasing the weapons soon.  If you dig his work, you\'re in luck since he\'s also created great from-scratch and lore-friendly texture replacements for Iron, Steel, Plate, Leather and Elven full sets (and is working through all the rest)

So, if my textures aren\'t your style (and, actually, even if they are) you should head on over and check out his work.[/color][/size][/b]

--------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FCD600][size=4]
Here are the console codes for these new items:

Heroic Dwarven Armor: 0E000D63
Heroic Dwarven Boots: 0E000D66
Heroic Dwarven Gauntlets: 0E000D67
Heroic Dwarven Helmet: 0E000D68
Heroic Dwarven Shield: 0E000D69

Heroic Dwarven Arrow: 0E002882
Heroic Dwarven Battleaxe: 0E0012D5
Heroic Dwarven Bow: 0E0012D6
Heroic Dwarven Dagger: 0E0012D7
Heroic Dwarven Greatsword: 0E0012D8
Heroic Dwarven Mace: 0E0012D9
Heroic Dwarven Sword: 0E0012DA
Heroic Dwarven War Axe: 0E0012DB
Heroic Dwarven Warhammer: 0E0012DC
[/size][/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------

EDIT: Added a new file that includes the Heroic Dwarven Arrows. It was an oversite the first go around, and the original download includes the textures. The new file requires the original main file to be downloaded, and then overwrite with the new plugin file and meshes.

The Heroic Dwarven Arrows do 18 damage and can be traded out for regular dwarven arrows at any forge, either one by one or ten at a time.

--------------------------------------------------------------

This mod is a standalone version of my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4818]Heroic Dwarven Armor and Weapons retexture[/url].  I\'ve been meaning to make this for a while; thanks for hanging in there!

[center][youtube]adsY_20hZJE&hd=1[/youtube]
Thanks go to member Arsenalrobert for making this video showcasing the Heroic Dwarven set!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9pScc.jpg[/img][/center]

If you get a chance, check out my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10078]Drakehelm Manor and Grotto[/url] home mod. It\'s a great house located near Dragon Bridge with a hidden Goonies-style grotto underneath.
author: mgbeach

files.name: Heroic Dwarven Arrows Addon to Main File
files.fileName: Heroic Dwarven Arrows Addon to Main File-11517-1-1.zip
files.changelogHtml: Adds new plugin file and meshes to enable the Heroic Dwarven Arrows
